No. 221918)] Sub: Creation of Finance under PDs/ROs and implementing arrangement of making large payments at NHAI (HQ) regarding In order to generate speed and efficiency related to payments, accounting and other financial matters at all field units, the following restructuring has been decided with immediate effect: To convert FARO system into a small Finance Wing   of ROs/PDs   and de- centralise F&A Manpower to PIUs/ ROs accordingly. (ii) Transfers/ Postings of FGA cadre officials will be done on requirement basis and orders in this regard will be issued separately. (iii) All payments more than Rs.5 Crore for all active PIUs of NHAI shall be made from NHAI(HQ) using a separate SNA Account at NHAI HQ level: (iv) Payments below Rs. 5 Crore shall be made from PIU (First signatory) and RO- Finance wing (DGM/DM as the case may be) as second signatory to release day to basis payments of establishment, general nature below 5 crores. For payment related to RO office one Technical Official (DDO/first signatory under  TSA/PFMS) shall be authorised and DM (F&A) available at RO office shall be second signatory (under TSA/PFMS): (vi) In relation to Point (iii) above, a separate SNA Accounts at HQ will be created to tag all active PIUs for payment of Rs. 5 Crore and above under TSA/PFMS system for operationalising PIU level payments; For payment above Rs. 5 crore, PIU FGA person will be first signatory under TSA and one official not below the rank of DGM will be second signatory. (vii) APAR Reporting of Finance cadre officials will be as under: SL: Reporting Reviewing No_ Officials reported upon Authority Authority Accountant/Asst. Manager / PD/GM of Main Dy. Manager   posted in PIUs Charge only: CGM (Finance) in- 2 Accountant/Asst . Manager / Regional Officers. charge of cadre Dy Manager / Manager / DGM posted in ROs and additionally looking after PIUs also: Note: Only in case of any representation, contradiction in comments & marking, disagreement, expunging of any comment/remarks of reporting or reviewing authority in APAR, Member   (Finance) will be approving & accepting authority.
